arts.ttl: Chelsea identify 'priority' January deal as Osimhen truth revealed
arts.sum: The 28-year-old is yet to be included in a Premier League matchday squad since Maresca’s arrival from Leicester City, and The Athletic claim that selling Chilwell has been named as “the priority” by Chelsea’s hierarchy ahead of the January window. Osimhen has been heavily linked with a move to Stamford Bridge in 2025, following Chelsea’s failure to sign him this year, but The Athletic report that Maresca’s side aren’t expected to pursue the Nigerian in January.

arts.ttl: Romano reveals Osimhen to Man Utd transfer secret
arts.sum: Fabrizio Romano has dropped a major update over transfer rumours linking Victor Osimhen to Manchester United in the January transfer window. PSG were the other club close to landing Osimhen earlier in 2024 and the Parisians appear to be the greatest danger to Man Utd signing the forward.
